authenticity_naturalness.description: The candidate spoke naturally with spontaneous responses.
examples: Answered leadership question with a personal anecdote.

rapport_likeability.description: The candidate maintained positive rapport with the interviewer.

examples: Provided clear example during problem-solving discussion.

pauses_delivery.description: Pauses were natural, no signs of reading from a screen.

speech_patterns.description: Speech was conversational with natural fillers.

physical_cues.description: Eye contact with camera, no distraction cues.

integrity_assessment.description: High integrity, no signs of AI assistance.

summary.recommendation: Candidate is reliable and recommended for further consideration.
